name: HammerKing
description:
This is a game jam project based on the theme of "sports game", but a special constrant is that the aiming demograph probably the disable kids in a charity, so it requires simple input method.

Team member: Link, Cheny, Rockfield

All the assets and audio are created by ourselves

In the game, there are three players will throw the hammer in turns, the way they throw the hammer is based on the volume of their shout. The louder they shout the further they throw, but players need to control the timming when the throw it, to guarantee a right direction. All the input requirements are holding "space" and shout.
